Class DorminMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.clearsighted.tutorbase.dormin.DorminMessage

public class DorminMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Dormin message as Java objects.

public java.lang.String Verb
The Dormin verb.

MessageNum

public int MessageNum
A message sequence number that should usually be incremented for each message. The constructor does this automatically, but it can be overwritten if necessary.

Address

public DorminAddress Address
The address of the target of the message.

Parameters

public DorminParameter[] Parameters
Parameters for the message.
